title: Guinness Braised Cabbage
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 medium shallots, diced', '1 dessertspoon minced fresh ginger root', '250g (9 oz) shredded red cabbage', '250 (9 oz) shredded green cabbage', '225ml (8 fl oz) Guinness', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
